Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Trowbridge is a historic market town in the county of Wiltshire which is located approximately 8 miles to the south east of Bath, 18 miles south east of Bristol. The Isaac Pitman is located in the heart of Trowbridge town centre on the south side of Market Street, opposite the pedestrianised retailing area. It forms part of the Castle Place
Shopping Centre with occupiers nearby including Costa, Wilko and Lloyds Pharmacy.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: LEASEHOLD PUBLIC HOUSE AT THE ENTRANCE TO THE CASTLE PLACE SHOPPING CENTRE

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Trowbridge is the county town of Wiltshire and is well located 12 miles south of Chippenham and 12 miles south east of Bath. There are excellent highspeed rail services to London from Westbury, Chippenham and Bath, as well as junctions 17 and 18 of the M4 motorway. The property occupies a prominent position on Fore Street adjacent Costa Coffee.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with first floor ancillary. The unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 28 September 2026, subject to a tenant break option by previous notice on 27 September 2021 . Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent
£33,000 per annum exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is E.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £24,250 and the rates payable are £11,906.75 pa. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the county of Wiltshire, Melksham is a popular market town 10 miles east of Bath and 6 miles south of Chippenham. The subject property occupies a central position on the main high street which has a good mixture of national and independent retailers. Nationals on the high street include: Lloyds Pharmacy, Clarks Shoes, WH Smith, Boots and Co-op.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is arranged over a basement, ground and first floor. The ground floor comprises of a banking hall and offices. The first floor provides a staff room, storage and staff toilets. The basement a strong room and boiler room.

Terms / Tenure
The property is available by way of assignment or alternatively a sub-lease may be considered subject to terms.

The property is held on an existing full repairing and insuring lease for a term of 15 years expiring 3rd June 2023.

Rent
Current rent passing £21,903 per annum, exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is E.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £14,500 and the rates payable are ££7,119.50 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 49.1p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Marlborough is a popular tourist village situated in Wiltshire on the old main road from London to Bath. The property occupies a prominent position on the High Street, adjacent Cath Kidston and Jacqueline Burns Opticians. Other operators include within the immediate local vicinity include: Waitrose, Boots Opticians, Joules, Jack Wills & Fat Face.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A period single storey terraced building with an ornate stone façade plus basement. The ground floor comprises banking hall, interview rooms, cashiers, back office and a dumb waiter whilst the basement comprises strong room, boiler room, bullion hoist and a night safe.

Terms / Tenure
The property is available by way of assignment or sublease of the lease.

The property is held on an existing fully repairing and insuring lease for a term of 15 years expiring 03rd June 2023. The next rent review is due on the 4th June 2017 (Annual RPI Linked Review).

Rent
Current rent passing £31,290 per annum, exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is D.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £26,250 and the rates payable are £12,888.75 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Calne is a historic market town in Wiltshire situated on
the A4, approximately 12 miles South of Junction 16 of
the M4 Motorway. The High Street is a pedestrianised
section of Calne forting part of the town centres main
retail pitch together with Phelps Parade Shopping
centre.
National occupiers within the vicinity include Boots,
Iceland and Costa Coffee.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The subject demise comprises a three storey building
plus basement arranged with banking hall on the
ground floor, offices on the first floor and second floor.
There are two garages with parking bays at the front.
The basement provides additional storage.

Tenure
Leasehold

Rent
£21,000 per annum.

Terms
The property is available by way of assignment with an
existing lease expiry of 08/05/2023.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the
current Rateable Value of the property is £20,500.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The subject property is located in Swindon which is between London and Bristol on the M4. Nearby national retailers in close proximity include; New Look, Bonmarche, HMV, Subway and Costa.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with ancillary. The unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 26 September 2022. Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent

EPC

Rates
